channel.title: Need help >_>
channel.description:
ok heres what happens whenever i download a server when i try and open it..or it just closes
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img58.imageshack.us/img58/4270/wtfkc7.png[/img][/URL]
Can someone help me[br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 04:18:45 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone help me? :o

item.title: Need help >_>
item.dc:creator: @wenatchee2 wenatchee2
item.description:
@wenatchee2 wrote:

zomg are you not smart…(stupid)…I am playing on someones server you idiot…read up…but nobody is showing…stop with the spam and your sig is retarded[br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 07:53:42 PM[/size][hr]o and java…i can get on the servers…i can play the servers…but NOBODY IS ON THEM[br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 07:55:19 PM[/size][hr]Hmm…i dont get what your saying…can you give me the link to the java that i need to be able to PLAY WITH OTHERS?!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help >_>
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

Ok edit your compile to ::

@echo off title rapeScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe" server pause

Obviously, changed the jdk/jre.1.5.0_10 to what ever version you have.

~[Oo][Java][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 19:51:44[/size][hr]by the way, this will allow you to not only compile but run server in the same .bat…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help >_>
item.dc:creator: @shadow_hearts shadow hearts
item.description:
@shadow_hearts wrote:

sigh… your the only one on the server because it’s your server and no one has logged on to your IP…go to portforward… it will tell you your IP then u advertise it in rs2 server advertisement and ppl will play…

Read full topic

item.description:

well…i have jdk 6.0 or w\e…i can get on servers now wooohoo…but the other prob is…im the only one on the server -.- it doesnt show anyone else -.-[br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 07:37:23 PM[/size][hr]help me ? :)[br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 07:42:45 PM[/size][hr]or nbot

item.title: Need help >_>
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

Umm… Download a new client…[br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 06:57:24 PM[/size][hr]You also need jre 6.0 and jdk 6.0. If you are using winrar to unzip the file. Right click and press extract to “file name”. That is about every problem you can possibly have. I know a few more though so tell me if it doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help >_>
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Minimize that screen, then run MoparScape. Enter a username and password, then for the Server IP, put either ‘127.0.0.1’ or ‘localhost’.

-Alexia

Read full topic
